alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 13 at 2:15PM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO 8 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...New River Mesa, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 7 PM Tuesday to 8 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects will become airborne. Moderate tree and minor structural damage possible.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
